title: Richbased
author: Richbased
content: Overtime i see that whenever there is a dip in the price of bitcoin, other altcoins tends to follow suit by also dropping in their prices and whenever there is an increase in the price of bitcoin, other coin as well increase in their value. Does it mean that other altcoins cannot be dependent on their own? Like must the activities of bitcoin affect the alternate coins at all time? I really want to understand why alternate coins like BNB, ETH, TWT, MATIC,  XRP,  LTC, DOT, ADA, SOL AVAX and so many other alternate cryptocurrencies are always affected whenever there is a change in the price of bitcoin like can't they be dependent on there own? as they are all cryptocurrencies despite the fact that bitcoin is more volatile than the rest of the cryptocurrencies.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: My brother there are 101 reasons wey dey make anything wey happen for bitcoin dey affect altcoins and I no go fit exhaust am finish.Apart from say bitcoin na the foremost cryptocurrency, bitcoin dey totally decentralized and that means there is unshakable trust in the coin and the community keeps rising. So you go hardly see someone wey get altcoins for him wallet wey no get btc but you fit see person wey get btc without altcoins. Those wey been get only altcoins because no increase in the price without bitcoin increase, they move to bitcoin.Bitcoin dominance of cryptocurrency na around/above 51% while altcoins share the rest percentage, so imagine that.Bitcoin Maximum supply na 21 million and can't be manipulated.Bitcoin halving na bum as it reduces the reward for mining bitcoin every 4 years into half and that keeps demand high. The trust is high and it is decentralized, has larger community who hodls it more than altcoins.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Richbased on November 14, 2023, 01:50:54 AMOvertime i see that whenever there is a dip in the price of bitcoin, other altcoins tends to follow suit by also dropping in their prices and whenever there is an increase in the price of bitcoin, other coin as well increase in their value. Does it mean that other altcoins cannot be dependent on their own? Bitcoin na their master, why many peoples dey Invest into those altcoins na because dem believe the altcoins go fit blow like Bitcoin or atleast increase small as BTC been do so when Bitcoin wey be the oga come dey correct, others go begin fear and dem go dey take profits from the altcoins so dey no go lose and that one also dey contributions to why altcoins dey fall. Also you need know say BTC pairs get most volume for the market as most altcoins are been traded against Bitcoin so as Bitcoin dey fall for price other altcoins go dey fall as well and this na why dem say make we no dey invest for altcoins with the mindset say we went diversify as e no go work because all the crypto makes dey go same direction majoring of the time. Bitcoin controls the market, the faith of the entire market is on Bitcoin so when Bitcoin dey do well every other coins go do well and the case na the same when Bitcoin no dey do well.Most altcoins na just copy of each other so dem no fit do well on their own, dey depend on the success of Bitcoin and the original project to survive. For your list so, BNB, SOL, ADA all dey do the same thing wey be smart contract parole and people just dey Invest inside them because dem expect dem to get the same success wey their oga ETH dun get so when BTC correct and e affect ETH, other smart contract go take a hit too and you fit talk the same thing about other altcoins like of Dogecoin market gets affect other memecoin also gets affected. Some altcoins though dey go the opposite when market dey crash but dem no plenty.

comments.body: How Bitcoin dey take effect altcoin price movement be say, when people buy Bitcoin the price go start to dey rise first, then at some point, some traders and short term investors, or people that long Bitcoin via Futures go start to dey take profit out of the market and some of those profit, dem go start to dey use am buy altcoin dem while e go make altcoin go start to dey increase while Bitcoin will now enter the point of ranging or start to consolidate because those profit taking and some late buyers wey enter the market, Then either the price goes for a further move upwards or it reverses downwards and altcoin go follow suit.
